recipes.label: Hint: A Charming Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Grail.

recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Grail
recipes.startdescription: I reach for a finale with all the passion I can muster. As my cheeks flush, so does the audience.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?
